special_text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature has base power and toughness 0/1.
[0]: You may sacrifice a Food. If you do, put three loyalty counters on Cadewyn, Short Order Cook. Otherwise, create a Food token.
[-3]: Create three 1/1 colorless Food Golem artifact creature tokens with haste and “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: You gain 3 life.”
[-8]: You get an emblem with “Whenever an artifact you control enters or leaves the battlefield, this emblem deals 1 damage to any target, and you gain 1 life.”
notes:
10%
Changed name, changed art
Worked with MRD and Nijugo on a rework.
